{"step_by_step_thinking": "The documents mention that non-Hodgkin's lymphoma is the most common type of lymphoma in the orbit. The WHO classification divides non-Hodgkin's lymphomas into B- or T-cell neoplasms, with 85% of general lymphomas and almost all orbital lymphomas consisting of B-cell tumours. Therefore, the most common type of Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma in the orbit is B-cell.", "answer_choice": "A"}
